title: Remove specific certificate from CertificatesFolder grid

requirements.text: Remove the certificate image at grid position div[5] within section[8]/div[1]/div[2] from the CertificatesFolder component array (frontend/src/components/CertificatesFolder.tsx)
acceptanceCriteria: The certificate at the specified XPath position /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[8]/div[1]/div[2]/div[5]/div[1]/div[1] is removed from the staticCertificates array
The grid layout adjusts automatically to fill the gap
No broken image references remain in the component

requirements.text: Delete the corresponding certificate image file from the frontend/public/assets/ directory that was displayed at grid position div[5]
acceptanceCriteria: The image file is completely removed from the assets directory
No orphaned files remain in the project

constraints: Only remove the certificate at the exact grid position specified by the XPath: section[8]/div[1]/div[2]/div[5]
Do not modify any other certificates in the grid
Preserve the existing responsive grid layout and spacing
nonGoals: Removing any other certificates from the gallery
